description:
Mariel as child, many years before the beginning of this story.
She is the result of the Blue Silent Bell project by http://anidb.net/ch26296 [Hanaukyou Hokusai] - a genetically engineered perfect maid that would do anything to make her young master http://anidb.net/ch3381 [Hanaukyou Tarou] happy.
This part of the manga story is ignored in the first TV series but the core theme of the La Verit√© remake.
name: Mariel (Childhood)
